name: Tsevah
description:
The goal is to get the color blocks on the appropriate colored switch. The color blocks move in the opposite direction of the player. If two colors blocks touch they will mix (e.g. red+yellow=orange) Avoid walking into the color blocks...unless you want to die. There are only 15 levels at this moment. I might make some more levels.

 You'll have to click the game a second time to activate the keyboard. 

Move: arrow keys

To restart: press Z

Manual: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1i1kzvQRo8u-t4bzuM6hZZYqnt_Z81BP4Fw3t7Izf__Y/...
